Description: Just listed 3 room, 1 bed plus office with ALL UTILITIES INCLUSIVE. Clean, bright and spacious. Not fancy. It's more charming as well as super functional. Deep living room. Nice closet space. Great extended kitchen. Fine natural light all around. Refrigerator, electric stove, shared and free washer/dryer (basement level), light storage, 1 car at rear drive all inclusive. Half fee (only). Start date is August 16 to September 1 latest. On pets 1-2 cats only considered. Makes the grade ! Call Jack Lambergs, Ingram Realty
